subject: [svn:parrot-pdd] r18698 - trunk/docs/pdds/draft
body:
Author: allison
Date: Wed May 30 17:55:39 2007
New Revision: 18698

Modified:
   trunk/docs/pdds/draft/pddXX_pmc.pod

Log:
[pdd] Typo fix in PMC proposal.


Modified: trunk/docs/pdds/draft/pddXX_pmc.pod
==============================================================================
--- trunk/docs/pdds/draft/pddXX_pmc.pod	(original)
+++ trunk/docs/pdds/draft/pddXX_pmc.pod	Wed May 30 17:55:39 2007
@@ -145,7 +145,7 @@
 
 =head2 Locking or opmc->pmc_ext->_synchronize
 
-PMCs do no support locking universally. Creating sharable PMCs at
+PMCs do not support locking universally. Creating sharable PMCs at
 runtime (from standard PMCs) is again done by transparent Refs like
 C or C.
